Plot: A distant poor relative of the Duke of D'Ascoyne plots to inherit the title by murdering the eight other heirs who stand ahead of him in the line of succession.
Writer: Roy Horniman (novel), Robert Hamer (screenplay), John Dighton (screenplay)
Title: Kind Hearts and Coronets
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 3 wins & 2 nominations.
Actors: Dennis Price, Valerie Hobson, Joan Greenwood, Alec Guinness
